contentList.content: Whether alone in a hut or as part of a monastery, you've spent a considerable amount of time outside the trappings of society. You've grown comfortable pondering the wonders and mysteries of creation.
A life spent in seclusion grants a clear mind, but makes the chaos of society distasteful.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Religion">Religion</LSTag>, skills garnered after years of being solitary, becoming comfortable pondering the wonders and mysteries of creation.

You called the open water your home, survived some of the sea's harshest storms. You've swapped stories with the best of them, whether that's on the barstool of a random port or the denizens of the world beneath the waves.
You are pushed by greed and wanderlust, ever curious, seeking hoards and wonders unknown. Finding secret treasures opens the path to new discoveries.

You have <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficiency</LSTag> in <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag>, picked up from surviving the seas while on the hunt for treasure and adventure.
